text:
Using mod_ldap, I'm seeing a lot of entries in the error log like this:

[Sun Sep 26 19:20:40 2004] [crit] (13)Permission denied: failed to init caching
lock in child process

I'd be happy to change the permissions to allow "nobody" to write the file, but
I have no idea where it is trying to write the file (or lock it, for that
matter). Can the file location be added to the error message, and can you tell
me where it is trying to write and lock the file?

Thanks!
creator: david@kineticode.com

text: Fixed in HEAD, waiting for backport to v2.0.
creator: minfrin@apache.org
